title: For Gunthewari development regularized under the provisions of Maharashtra Gunthewari Development Act, 2001 and falling in TOD zone, seeking permission for development / redevelopment, these regulations shall apply
clause_text: For Gunthewari development regularized under the provisions of Maharashtra Gunthewari Development Act, 2001 and falling in TOD zone, seeking permission for development / redevelopment, these regulations shall apply.
section: Incentive for providing Public Parking in the area falling within the radius of 200 m. from the Metro / MRTS Station.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
